arts.ttl: LA Galaxy and Sporting KC Set Crazy MLS Records this Weekend
arts.sum: Sporting Kansas City and LA Galaxy made history in their Matchday 11 clash on Sunday night

arts.ttl: Maya Yoshida own goal keeps defending-champion Galaxy reeling in 1-0 loss to Sporting KC
arts.sum: Los Angeles Galaxy defender Maya Yoshida had the only score on Sunday night, unfortunately it was an own goal that led to a 1-0 victory for Sporting Kansas City â€” continuing the worst start by a defending champion in league history. John Pulskamp had to make one save and it came in the first half on the way to his second clean sheet in his 11th start of the season for Sporting KC.
